__e: Maybe next week, I'll take you to our decorator.
You call what you do a job?
That's nothing compared with this morning.
And you call her a mother? .
You go to bed with another woman and this is good news?
Is that what you call a proposal?
That's nothing compared with this morning.
Well, whatever you call it, love or anything else... it won't be over till we're dead.
You're calling the station psychiatrist instead of working?
Now, you call the studio and you tell them to read the fine print in my contract.
And when you have a little one, I want you to call it little Jimmy!
You disturb the neighbors, I'll cut you up and eat you for dinner.
Look, I want you to call research, Have them pull every article from the last couple years that's critical to the Companions.
If you shout for your father I'll break everything here!
We'll call your father tonight. When you talk to him, you say... sort of casually...
In case you're wondering... I'm waiting right here until you do call your father.
You call the police, and I'll go check it out.
I don't want you calling the police.
This is the second time in two days that you've called the police.
I don't want you calling the police.
I haven't been out in what you call society.
This is the second time in two days that you've called the police.
If this is what you call living, I don't want any part of it.
I do not want to see the woman I love, married ... you with that so little delicately call "bad smell".
A little blood on your hands from what you consider justice?
